name: GetInvoiceById
description:
Retrieve invoice details by ID.

Fetch invoice information using the unique identifier, `{invoiceId}`. This can include internal object ID or any unique property value specified by the `idProperty` parameter.

parameters.name: invoice_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the invoice. This can be the internal object ID or any unique property value as specified by the `id_property`.

parameters.name: requested_properties
parameters.description: List of properties to be returned in the response for the specified invoice. Properties not present on the object will be ignored.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: historical_properties
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of properties to return along with their history of previous values.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned along with their history of previous values. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: associated_object_types
parameters.description: List of object types to retrieve associated IDs for, separated by commas. Ignored if associations don't exist.

value_schema.description: A comma separated list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. If any of the specified associations do not exist, they will be ignored.

parameters.name: unique_identifier_property
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values uniquely identify the invoice object. Specify this to use a unique property other than the internal object ID.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

parameters.name: return_archived_only
parameters.description: Specify `True` to return only archived results. `False` returns both archived and non-archived results.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.
